attributes.action: Stop the Civil Aviation Authority from raising the charges  by 100% for airshows
attributes.additional_details: It will impact on jobs in an already struggling industry and will be the cause of small local shows which rise money for charity's to close completely.
attributes.background: Stop the CAA from raising by 100% the charges levied on airshows and display pilots in the UK. This is totally unfair and undeserved. It will stop most small airshows raising money for charity as well as impacting on the cost of large airshows. It will stop money going into local economy's.
